com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Class RhizosphereLazyPanel<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Panel
              com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SimplePanel
                  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.LazyPanel
                      com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.RhizosphereLazyPanel<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.AcceptsOneWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasOneWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets.ForIsWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ProvidesResize, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.RequiresResize, java.lang.Iterable<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>
public class RhizosphereLazyPanel<T>
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.LazyPanel
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.RequiresResize, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ProvidesResize

Helper panel to simplify the addition of a Rhizosphere visualization in a GWT application, hiding all the steps necessary to inject the Rhizosphere APIs in the GWT application.

The panel behaves like a LazyPanel, and therefore lazily injects the Rhizosphere APIs only when it becomes visible, improving application startup latency and GWT payload size. In addition, while the Rhizosphere libraries injection is in progress, the panel will show a customizable 'loading in progress' widget (such as an hourglass icon), which will be dismissed as soon as Rhizosphere finishes loading.

To following snippet shows how you can use the panel in conjunction with a UIBinder template: 


 <ui:UiBinder xmlns:ui='urn:ui:com.google.gwt.uibinder'
     xmlns:g='urn:import:com.google.gwt.user.client.ui'
     xmlns:r='urn:import:com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client'>
   <r:RhizosphereLazyPanel
       width="100%" height="100%" ui:field="rhizospherePanel">
   </r:RhizosphereLazyPanel>
 </ui:UiBinder>
 

 @UiField
 RhizosphereLazyPanel<Employee> rhizospherePanel;
 
 @UiFactory
 RhizosphereLazyPanel<Employee> createRhizospherePanel() {
   RhizosphereLazyPanel<Employee> panel = 
       new RhizosphereLazyPanel<Employee>(
           new Image("loading_icon.gif"),
           new RhizosphereBuilder());
   panel.setLoadingDelayMillis(200);
   return panel;
 }
 
 private class RhizosphereBuilder
     implements RhizosphereLazyPanel.RhizosphereBuilder<Employee> {
 
   public Rhizosphere<Employee> build() {
     Rhizosphere<Employee> r = new Rhizosphere<Employee>();
     // ... your code here
     return r;
   }
 }

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Constructor Detail

RhizosphereLazyPanel

public RhizosphereLazyPanel(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget loadingWidget,
                            RhizosphereLazyPanel.RhizosphereBuilder<T> builder)
Creates a new panel to host a Rhizosphere visualization.

Parameters:
loadingWidget - Widget to temporarily show in the panel while Rhizosphere libraries are injected in the GWT host page.
builder - Builder that will assemble a Rhizosphere instance to fit inside the panel.

RhizosphereLazyPanel

public RhizosphereLazyPanel(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget loadingWidget,
                            RhizosphereLazyPanel.RhizosphereBuilder<T> builder,
                            java.lang.String theme,
                            boolean useGoogleCDN,
                            int loadingDelayMillis)
Creates a new panel to host a Rhizosphere visualization.

Parameters:
loadingWidget - Widget to temporarily show in the panel while Rhizosphere libraries are injected in the GWT host page.
builder - Builder that will assemble a Rhizosphere instance to fit inside the panel.
theme - The visual theme that Rhizosphere will use.
useGoogleCDN - Whether the Google CDN should be used as possible to load Rhizosphere libraries and its dependencies.
loadingDelayMillis - The amount of time to wait, since the start of the Rhizosphere libraries injection, before showing the loading widget. The purpose of this timer is to avoid flickering of the loading widget if Rhizosphere libraries load quickly enough.
Method Detail

setUseGoogleCDN

public void setUseGoogleCDN(boolean useGoogleCDN)
Uses Google CDN to load Rhizosphere libraries and its dependencies as much as possible.

Parameters:
useGoogleCDN - Whether the Google CDN should be used as possible to load Rhizosphere libraries and its dependencies.

setTheme

public void setTheme(java.lang.String theme)
Sets the visual theme that Rhizosphere will use. Note that this method does _not_ perform validation, so it's up to the caller to verify that the specified theme actually exists.

This setting is ignored if Rhizosphere libraries have already been injected in the GWT host page when this panel is created. See RhizosphereLoader.setTheme(String) for further info.

Parameters:
theme - The name of the theme to use.

setLoadingDelayMillis

public void setLoadingDelayMillis(int loadingDelayMillis)
Sets the amount of time to wait, since the start of the Rhizosphere libraries injection, before showing the loading widget. The purpose of this timer is to avoid flickering of the loading widget if Rhizosphere libraries load quickly enough.

Parameters:
loadingDelayMillis - Amount of time to wait before showing the loading widget.

getRhizosphere

public Rhizosphere<T> getRhizosphere()
Returns the Rhizosphere instance hosted within this panel.

Returns:
The Rhizosphere instance hosted within this panel, or null if the instance has not been created yet.
